data.text: @RepWexton Perhaps some of that money should have gone to teaching young people how to pilot big rigs, or drilling for oil and gas.  Why is your party standing in the way of LNG exports?
@RepWexton I just paid $4.299/gal for gas. What are you going to do as our representative about this issue?

@RepWexton 38 kids were killed, 71 wounded, 1.5 mln in the areas affected by the shelling in @Ukraine. We call on to #CloseTheSky or at least to provide us with fighter jets, anti-rocket and anti-aircraft defense. Putin will not stop until he is stopped! #ProtectUASky 🇺🇦 #StandWithUkraine https://t.co/2YrlhWrZj7

@RepWexton This is a tragic incident that happened in Feng County, Jiangsu Province, China. A girl was kidnapped, chained for more than 20 years, gave birth to eight children.
The evil CCP！
Take down the CCP！
https://t.co/8Cn0w3fN1s

@RepWexton And for the life of me I just can’t figure out why inflation is at 10%
